title: Top 10 Font Resources
content:
Which 10 do you think are a must?

I would say for me a one of them would be FontBook: [http://www.fontshop.com/products/fontbook/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201160028/http:/www.fontshop.com/products/fontbook/ "http://www.fontshop.com/products/fontbook/")

What are your favourites?
author: sparkie7

comments.content:
In no particular order:

- Typophile :)  
- Bringhurst, Elements of typographic style  
- Linotype fontexplorer  
- Adrian Frutiger, Der Mensch und seine Zeichen  
- Meggs, A history of graphic design

There's probably some I'm forgetting, but these are always on my side

Jeffrey  
 [infraordinaire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201160028/http:/www.infraordinaire.com/wordpress)
